test.name: Capif Callback Server Test Case

kw.name: Run Keyword
kw.doc: Executes the given keyword with the given arguments.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=mysession, url=http://dummy-netapp_capif_callback_server_1:8080, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Should Contain
kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.
